Name: Clover Leaf 'Martini'
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker.
Review: Carpet scaring red, this fruity adaptation perhaps has a wider appeal than the original Clover Leaf cocktail .
History: A fruity neo-Martini riff on the classic Clover Leaf cocktail created in the late 1990s-early noughties.
